## Path type

Type which eagerly collects all paths through a type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Path<T> = T extends any ? PathInternal<T> : never;
```

## Example


```
Path<{foo: {bar: string}}> = 'foo' | 'foo.bar'
```
